attributes.action: Three disable kids need assylum in UK (www.miracleforthree.com)
attributes.additional_details:
What would you do if someone told you that all three of your children have a rare and sometimes fatal genetic disorder and that they will be confined to wheelchairs for the rest of their lives? We are the Zubairs and we refuse to accept that life sentence for our children. We need your help. Support us for treatment palliative care children in UK. We are living in Pakistan, every where terror and corruption is common.What these kids will do after their parents life?
Please support us to migrate UK on HUMANITY GROUNDS, so atleats my kids spend their remaining life is Peace.For Details please see our website: www.miracleforthree.com
Our hopes and happiness is depending on your decison.
